objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor plane with a light-colored finish in a soft neutral tone, smooth surface resembling light wood or polished laminate, providing a bright and clean appearance.
A vertical rectangular wall with smooth plaster surface painted in a soft pastel tone, minimal texture, clean bright finish suitable for an indoor classroom environment.
A vertical rectangular wall with smooth plaster surface painted in a soft pastel tone, minimal texture, clean bright finish suitable for an indoor classroom environment.

A large rectangular window with clear glass panes set in a slim white frame, modern minimalist design allowing ample natural light into the room.
A rectangular entrance door with a light wood finish, simple modern style featuring flat panels and a sleek metal handle.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white surface and slim silver aluminum frame, smooth writing area for dry-erase markers.

A sturdy rectangular teacher's desk with a darker wood finish, prominent flat top surface, robust construction, slightly tapered legs, providing a commanding focal point at the front of the classroom.
A single chair with dark wood frame and matching cushioned seat, simple ergonomic style with straight backrest, complementing the teacher's desk.
A single-unit combination of rectangular student desk and attached chair, featuring a light wood texture on the desk surface and seat, minimalist design with slender metal supports.
